title: [QUESTION] Getting InvalidInput exception
body:
I have an image for which I am doing SKCodec.Create. My problem is that I get an exception when accessing the propery `Pixels` - InvalidInput.

Example:
```
var result = SKCodec.Create (filename);
var codecPixels = codec.Pixels; // throw Exception
```

How can I know that the picture is bad without calling the `Pixels`, since this causes all bytes of the picture to be read (in cause with good picture)? 
Maybe I can understand this by some first bytes? Or could you say what exactly wrong with this picture? 
https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13122070/98657991-912f8380-2353-11eb-8f18-941bcbd3df38.jpg

As I understand, this function is causing the exception https://github.com/google/skia/blob/master/src/codec/SkJpegCodec.cpp#L543
